[![](https://scrutinizer-ci.com/g/russianidiot/app-command.sh.cli/badges/quality-score.png?b=master)](https://scrutinizer-ci.com/g/russianidiot/app-command.sh.cli)

[![](https://api.travis-ci.org/russianidiot/app-command.sh.cli.svg)](https://travis-ci.org/russianidiot/app-command.sh.cli/)
[![](https://api.shippable.com/projects/57cf14529b88a61000f2585e/badge?branch=master)](https://app.shippable.com/projects/57cf14529b88a61000f2585e)
[![](https://app.wercker.com/status/5bc6b41b0598284ba53b6f170f80c712/s/master)](https://app.wercker.com/russianidiot/app-command.sh.cli)
[![](https://semaphoreci.com/api/v1/russianidiot/app-command-sh-cli/branches/master/badge.svg)](https://semaphoreci.com/russianidiot/app-command-sh-cli)
[![](https://scrutinizer-ci.com/g/russianidiot/app-command.sh.cli/badges/build.png?b=master)](https://scrutinizer-ci.com/g/russianidiot/app-command.sh.cli)

Features
````````
*	find in /Applications, ~/Applications, /System/Library/CoreServices
*	case insensitive
*	symlink support (brewcask), readlink	

Usage
`````

.. code:: bash

	usage: app COMMAND [options]
	
	Available commands:
		todo	todo desc
	

Example
```````

.. code:: bash

	# usage: app pid app
	$ app pid "iTunes" && echo "itunes running"
	
	# usage: app find "Finder"
	$ app find "Mail"
	/Applications/Mail.app
	
	$ app find "Finder"
	/System/Library/CoreServices/Finder.app
	
	# brewcask, /opt/homebrew-cask/... linked to ~/Applications
	$ app find "Google Chrome"
	/opt/homebrew-cask/Caskroom/google-chrome/latest/Google Chrome.app
	
	# usage: app quit appname ...
	$ app quit "Terminal" "iTerm2"
	
	# usage: app reopen appname ...
	$ app reopen "Google Chrome" "Firefox"
	
	# usage: hide apps by name
	$ app-hide "Finder" "Google Chrome" "Firefox"
	
	# hide all apps (except frontmost app)
	# (hotkey: option+cmd+H)
	$ app-hide
	
	# show
	$ open -a "Terminal"
	

`Examples/`_

.. _Examples/: https://github.com/russianidiot/app-command.sh.cli/tree/master/Examples

info.name: app-command
info.summary: find application path by name (OS X)
